section.title: Intended Audience
section.para: This book has been written for architects and designers of OpenStack clouds. This book is not intended for people who are deploying OpenStack. For a guide on deploying and operating OpenStack, please refer to the Operations Guide http://docs.openstack.org/openstack-ops.

The reader should have prior knowledge of cloud architecture and principles, experience in enterprise system design, Linux and virtualization experience, and a basic understanding of networking principles and protocols.
